activeProfile.comment: Indicate the name of the profile to use by default

profiles._config_summary.comment: A brief description of this item for nodeyez-config app
profiles.name.comment: The name of the profile. This should be unique across all profiles
profiles.name: default
profiles.address.comment: The ip address or fully qualified domain name to access the LND node
profiles.macaroon.comment: The macaroon for the LND node, converted to hex.  You can get this value by running this command on the macaroon file to be used: xxd -ps -u -c 1000 nodeyez.macaroon
profiles.port.comment: The port to connect to the LND node on
profiles.useTor.comment: Indicates whether remote calls should use tor socks proxy for privacy.
